text:
Aside from having the same last names, Selena Gomez and Becky G have so much in common. Although they are not related as some people might think, there are so many similarities between them, that it could easily be said that they both might just be each other's long lost soulmates.

Is Becky G Selena Gomez's sister?

Though they have the same last name, the stars are not related. Becky, whose full name is Rebbeca Gomez and Selena are also both of Mexican descent. While Selena is half Mexican through her dad Ricardo Gomez, Becky's both parents are Mexican and it has played a huge role in who they both are.

RELATED: 14 Celebrity Pairs Who Have the Same Last Name But Aren't Actually Related

Does Becky G look like Selena Gomez?

Aside from their dark eyes and dark hair, the girls don't have too much of physical resemblance but their paths in life do look pretty similar. They both began their careers super young, with Becky doing covers on YouTube and Sel acting on Barney and Friends and the Disney Channel. They have both since branched out from those things and now sing, dance and act in both movies and TV shows, proving that they are both major forces in the world of entertainment.

Are Becky G and Selena Gomez friends?

While we have never seen them hanging out together, the girls have so many of the same values that it is had to believe they would not be the best of friends if they knew each other. Both Selena and Becky G have been open about their humble beginnings and the struggles they faced with their families. Those bad times motivated them to be successful and to work hard at their crafts to help their loved ones live a better life. That is for sure something to bond over.

Will Selena Gomez and Becky G work together?

If you tweet anything about Selena or Becky, a swarm of loyal fans will find you and tell you just how much they love their faves. Selenators and Beasters are some of the world's most loyal fans and they have gained so many followers by simply staying true to themselves. So imagine how powerful they would be if they collaborated on something together? Woah!

RELATED: How Selena Gomez's Relationship With The Weeknd Is Way Different Than Her Time With Justin Bieber

Do they have any similarities in their current lives?

They have both lived their personal lives quite openly in front of the public eye, especially during their first relationships. Selena dated Justin Bieber and Becky dated Austin Mahone.

While both of those relationships have long since ended, it led them to find love and are currently extremely happy in their new relationships with The Weeknd and Sebastian Lletget.

It is understandable why people think these girls are related even though they are not, but we do hope that even if they were not destined to be relatives that at some point their paths cross and they can be one of the most iconic BFF duos the world has ever seen.

RELATED: Becky G and Sebastian Lletget Shower Each Other With Love on Their Anniversary

Love J-14? Be sure to subscribe to our YouTube channel for fun, exclusive videos with your favorite stars.
